entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS THIS EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 30
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY

CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
